name: add newline
func:
msg.payload = msg.payload + "\n"
return msg;

name: number of letters
send command
Reinitialize flow variables
Redirect response by command
If next comes data
data
response
func:
msg.payload = "response" + "\n" + msg.payload; 
return msg

pot_1 = flow.get("CV_pot1")
time_1 = flow.get("CV_time1")
pot_2 = flow.get("CV_pot2")
time_2 = flow.get("CV_time2")
pot_start = flow.get("CV_pot_start")
pot_end = flow.get("CV_pot_end")
slope = flow.get("CV_slope")

msg.payload = "EC" + " " + time_1 + " " + time_2 +  
                    " " + pot_1 + " " + pot_2 +
                    " " + pot_start + " " + pot_end + 
                    " " + slope + " ";

global.set("CV_command", msg.payload);
return msg;

name: set data next yes or no

Reinitialize flow variables

func:
flow.set("OCP_mode", msg.payload);
return msg;

flow.set("time_potentiometry", msg.payload);

name: Experiment case 2
func:
